name: Fairview Park Marriott

reviews.text: I love this hotel. It just feels like home. The staff is always friendly and out-going. Have stayed here on many occasions and always love the stay. The rooms are nice, beds are great, breakfast buffet is outstanding, pool while small is very nice with a huge hottub. Also, when staying for extended stays, they offer a laundry room with washers and dryers and even provide Tide and Bounce products. All free of charge.
reviews.title: Close to everything, feels like home!

likes.disliked: — Kids under 18 cannot use the hot-tub.

reviews.text: We had a very nice 2-night stay at the Fairview Park Marriott. The location was convenient to everything we wanted to see via metro and far enough away from it all to feel like it was a bit of a break from the outside world.
reviews.title: Very nice stay

reviews.text: Positives: The room was clean, comfortable, and Marriott beds are my favorite hotel beds. We had a refrigerator in our room, plenty of work space at the desk, lots of places to plug in, and the room was nice and quiet. We had a bunch of teenagers on our floor and never would have known had we not met them in the halls and elevator.
reviews.title: Great stay, friendy staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Drawback: The room was a bit smaller than standard. For some this might be an issue.
reviews.title: Decent Stay

likes.liked: — Great price for hotel. Good Location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would certainly stay here again if the opportunity presented itself. Overall a great visit!
reviews.title: Great night's sleep

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for from 6/15-21, 2007 and found the hotel to be very clean and the staff very friendly. Being a Revenue Manager of hotel near Disney Word(not a Marriott branded property) I am very critical of the hotels I stay at.
reviews.title: Great place to stay
